lead_paragraph: Nike has top billing among sports brands at the Rio Olympics, but a week into the Games, its stock is losing to Adidas and Under Armour.

headline.main: Nike's Stock Falls Behind Rivals Amid Rio Olympics
headline.print_headline: Nike's Stock Falls Behind Rivals Amid Rio Olympics
